name: Global Access
description: Access to all data across the entire organization without restrictions
examples: Super Admin can view/edit all records

name: Organization Access
description: Access to all data within the user's organization
examples: Organization Admin can view all data in their org

name: Department Access
description: Access to data within the user's department only
examples: Department Manager can view all team data

name: Team Access
description: Access to data within the user's team only
examples: Team Lead can view all team member records

name: Own Data Only
description: Access restricted to user's own data and records they created or own
examples: User can only view their own records

name: Custom Scope
description: Access based on custom rules and conditions defined per role
examples: Sales Rep can view customers in their territory
Project Manager can view projects they are assigned to
